Equality, Diversity and Inclusion matters are addressed at all of the departmental
committees and representatives from all staff and student groups in the
department meet regularly as the Chemistry EDI Committee.
Co-chairs: Matthew Kitching and AnnMarie O'Donoghue

There are currently vacancies for undergraduate student representatives on the
EDI. If you would like to get involved, please contact the co-chairs.
